entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Rain beginning this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023
